tasks.task: Operate a pump to remove water from a vehicle. The subtasks would be accessing the pump, determining which part of the truck needs draining, pumping water out, checking if done.
Operate a pump to remove water from a vehicle

Wait, perhaps submerging a vehicle in mud and pumping it out would be part of the agricultural work if it’s related to equipment. But then crossing a flooded area with a quad bike—maybe the pump is needed afterwards, so perhaps list the quad bike task as being through mud and add operating pump as a subtask. Or, perhaps separate the pump operation as its own MAINTASK.
Operate a pump to remove water from a vehicle’s compartment

So after pumping, perhaps the next task is opening gates. Alternatively, perhaps gates are opened while riding through the mud, but the transcript doesn't say that. The first action is reaching the gate, so probably a separate MAINTASK.
